title: Stochastic Processes
text:
This is the course website created by myself (Dr Thiyanga S. Talagala) for the unit STA 331 2.0: Stochastic Processes in the BSc (Hons) in Statistics program. I have been maintaining this unit since 2020, with updates and improvements made each year.
If you are looking for a strong student for your company or PhD position who has a solid background in stochastic processes, please feel free to contact me via email at ttalagala@sjp.ac.lk. The students I have recommended in the past are now pursuing their studies or careers at leading universities in Canada, the USA, Australia, and the UK.
